definition.text: We are not going to run a Live Trading Session just yet, so there is no point in keeping our data mining running at this point.

paragraphs.text: There are two main reasons to run a data mining op:
To process historic data. You may want to process a datetime range of any given Market to run a Backtesting Session, or to process new indicators.
To run a live session. Live sessions (Paper Trading Session, Forward Testing Session, and Live Trading Session) need a live market feed.
If all processes are up to date, then select Stop All Tasks in the Masters Task Manager
